DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy of tolterodine extended release formulation compared with immediate release formulation in subjects with symptoms of overactive bladder
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Efficacy and Safety Of Tolterodine Extended Release Capsule Compared With Tolterodine Immediate Release Tablet
DOC.criteria: Subjects with a diagnosis of overactive bladder. Subjects with significant stress incontinence as determined by the investigator. Subjects with recurrent urinary tract infections defined as treated for UTI; 5 times in the last year.
